com.poesys.db.dao.query
Class QueryListWithParameters<T extends IDbDto,S extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>

java.lang.Object
  com.poesys.db.dao.query.QueryListWithParameters<T,S,C>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of IDbDto to query
S - the type of IDbDto that contains the parameters
C - the collection type of the set of queried DTOs
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQueryListWithParameters<T,S,C>
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryCacheListWithParameters, QueryMemcachedListWithParameters
public class QueryListWithParameters<T extends IDbDto,S extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQueryListWithParameters<T,S,C>

An implementation of the IQueryListWithParameters interface that queries a list of data transfer objects (DTOs) based on a parameterized SQL statement. The list is guaranteed to be thread safe, and the DTOs should also be thread safe if you are going to use them in a multi-threaded environment.

Author:
Robert J. Muller
See Also:
IDbDto, IParameterizedQuerySql

query

public C query(java.sql.Connection connection,
               S parameters)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                               BatchException
Description copied from interface: IQueryListWithParameters
Query a list of DTOs using a set of parameters.

Specified by:
query in interface IQueryListWithParameters<T extends IDbDto,S extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
Parameters:
connection - The SQL connection with which to query
parameters - A database DTO containing the query parameters; this can be either a standard DTO for a database object or a DTO created specifically to hold a set of parameters
Returns:
a List of database DTO objects
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when there is a SQL problem with the query
BatchException - when an operation involving multiple objects fails

Parameters:

protected void queryNestedObjectsForList(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                         C list)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                         BatchException
Query the nested objects for all the objects in a list of objects of type C. You can override this method in a subclass to provide a session id for a caching session.

Parameters:
connection - the JDBC connection
list - the list of objects of type C
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when there is a database problem
BatchException - when there is a batch processing problem

Get a DTO from a SQL result set. Subclasses can override this method to provide caching or other services for the object.

Parameters:
connection - the database connection (for nested object queries)
rs - the result set from an executed SQL statement
Returns:
the object
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when there is a database access problem
BatchException - when batch processing fails for a nested object
